en.p1: Click on the grid to add the next letter in the queue.
en.p2: Make four letter words horizontally (left to right) or vertically (top to bottom) to score points.
en.p3: Survive as long as you can.

pl.p1: Click on the grid to add the next letter in the queue.
pl.p2: Make four letter words horizontally (left to right) or vertically (top to bottom) to score points.
pl.p3: Survive as long as you can.

it.p1: Clicca su una cella per aggiungere la prossima lettera.
it.p2: Completa parole di quattro lettere in orizzontale (da sinistra) o verticale (dall'alto) per fare punti.
